abstract: Petition drive for referendum on using public money to help pay for construction of soccer stadium in Las Vegas does not gather enough valid signatures.
lead_paragraph: A petition drive for a referendum on using public money to help pay for construction of a soccer stadium in downtown Las Vegas did not gather enough valid signatures.
snippet: A petition drive for a referendum on using public money to help pay for construction of a soccer stadium in downtown Las Vegas did not gather enough valid signatures.

headline.main: Nevada: Soccer Stadium Foes’ Petition Drive Rejected
headline.print_headline: Nevada: Soccer Stadium Foes’ Petition Drive Rejected
